texts.biography: Areshrak is a lizardman from the Couatl Islands off the coast of Jadame, who is a subordinate of Pactal. Usurped control of breeding wyverns, gorgons and other creatures after betraying the former breeder, and he handles relations with the local flight of Rust Dragons.
texts.name: Areshrak

specialty.name: Ballista
specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Ballista by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
